Room.Name: Triangular Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a strange, triangular room, covered with gold and jewels.
Room.LongDescription: The odd shaped room gets wider to the north, with the door forming the apex of the triangle. There is some arcane, ancient writing on the wall which reads "Those who seek wisdom will prevail. Those who seek gold will die." There are odd symbols around the room, but otherwise, the room is quite empty.
